response.overview: “You look to the sky and you see a plane. The plane is like the claw. It comes down and takes a child – maybe your best friend – never to be seen again. Where did they go? I don’t understand…But I want to go on the plane”.  What happens when you take an abandoned Brazilian street kid from the favelas of Salvador, and drop him into privileged English society? Three decades later, Pablo is still trying to figure things out.
response.title: The (Lost Found) Boy Man Bunny
